activities.loc: Branch I, Courthouse Annex, Second Floor

result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Collin K. Johnson

9:36 AM Defendant Collin K. Johnson in court.  Attorney Travis A. Crowell in court for Collin K. Johnson.  Attorney DeShea Morrow in court for State of Wisconsin. R.M., mother of the victim appears by ZOOM.
Court calls case.
Copy of complaint.
Atty Crowell heard - has reviewed with Deft.
Deft understands.
Waives formal reading.
Requests prelim.
Deft waives time limits.
Court schedules with parties.
9:39 AM
Preliminary hearing scheduled for October 19, 2022 at 03:00 pm.
Arraignment scheduled for October 19, 2022 at 03:00 pm.

9:09 AM Defendant Collin K. Johnson appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Christensen in court for Collin K. Johnson.  Attorney Kathryn E Heineck in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Court calls case.
Copy of Criminal Complaint.
Atty Christensen heard - has not had a chance to review the complaint with Deft.
Court reviews charges and max penalties.
Deft understands.
ADA heard on bond recommendations.
Atty Christensen heard.
Deft heard.
Court imposes $5,000 signature bond w/ conditions; sign waiver of extradition, no possession or consumption of alcohol or controlled substances w/o a valid Rx, no contact with Victim, may not go into any state where THC is legal in any form.
Deft to contact the Public Defender's office today.
Court schedules with parties.
9:15 AM
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for September 6, 2022 at 09:00 am.
